pages.text: Warp portals, like warp scrolls, provide a one-way teleport to any location, provided it is in the same dimension. To construct a Warp Portal, build a frame from Arcane Bricks or its variants in the shape of a nether portal and provide a full mana jar nearby. Then, throw a warp scroll with a written location into the frame. Given there is enough mana nearby, the portal will be created.
A magical portal that can send players, mobs, spells, and items to any location in the same dimension.
